# background

**Instance Property**

A configuration that describes the launch scene’s background.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var background: UIBackgroundConfiguration { get set }
```

## Configuring the appearance

- **title**: The title that appears in the title view.
- **documentTargetView**: The document target view.
- **browserViewController**: The document browser view controller.
